BasicInfo.short: Pebble is a company that develops a technology designed for smart watches to connect withÂ iPhone and Android smartphones using Bluetooth.

Products.name: Pebble Steel
Products.description: Pebble Steel is made for looking really good. Equipped with the same great features and 24/7 liveability of the original Pebble.

Products.name: Pebble Time 2
Products.description: Pebble 2 is the new version of Pebble watch with a larger screen and heart-rate monitor.

Products.name: Pebble Classic
Products.description: The first smartwatch, powered by an e-paper display

Products.name: Pebble Time Round
Products.description: Pebble Time Round is the world's lightest and thinnest watch.

Products.name: Pebble 2
Products.description: An uncompromising, heart-rate enabled smartwatch at an unbeatable price

Products.name: Pebble Time
Products.description: Pebble Time's new microphone lets you send voice replies to incoming notifications.

Products.name: Pebble Core
Products.description: Cellular-connected clip that streams music from Spotify, tracks your pace, distance, and location with GPS, and can send an emergency SOS.
